dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5441 RH: To amend the Federal charter of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States to reflect the service of women in the Armed Forces of the United States.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Miller of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

Additional sponsors: Mr. Hanna, Mr. Terry, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, Mr. Rigell, Mr. LoBiondo, Mr. Doyle, Ms. Titus, Mr. Tipton, Mr. Latham, Mr. Payne, Mr. DeFazio, Mr. Cassidy, Mr. Holt, Ms. DeLauro, Mr. Garrett, Mr. Walz, Mr. Bachus, Mr. Thompson of Pennsylvania, Mr. Meeks, Mr. Sessions, Mr. Ben Ray Luján of New Mexico, Mr. Bishop of New York, Mr. Blumenauer, Mrs. Black, Mr. Rangel, Mr. Cramer, Mr. Frelinghuysen, Ms. Sewell of Alabama, Mr. Rice of South Carolina, Mr. Griffith of Virginia, Mr. Nunnelee, Mrs. Negrete McLeod, Ms. Kuster, Mr. Heck of Nevada, Mr. King of New York, Mr. Murphy of Pennsylvania, Mr. Kline, Mr. Jones, Mr. Forbes, Mr. Duncan of South Carolina, Mr. Cole, Ms. Esty, Ms. Shea-Porter, Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York, Mr. Johnson of Ohio, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Walden, Mr. Palazzo, Ms. Herrera Beutler, Mr. Stewart, Mr. Perlmutter, Mr. Larsen of Washington, Mr. Ribble, Mr. Schiff, Mr. Gibson, Mr. Marchant, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Lowenthal, Mr. Courtney, Mr. Barber, Mrs. Walorski, Mr. Welch, Mr. Matheson, Mr. Nugent, Mr. Boustany, Mr. Neugebauer, Mrs. Lummis, Ms. DeGette, Mr. Collins of Georgia, Mr. Collins of New York, Ms. DelBene, Mr. Cicilline, Mr. Foster, Mr. Cohen, Mr. Kinzinger of Illinois, Mr. Walberg, Mr. Griffin of Arkansas, Mr. Wittman, Mr. Nolan, Mr. Garamendi, Ms. Sinema, and Ms. Bonamici
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend the Federal charter of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States to reflect the service of women in the Armed Forces of the United States.

section.header: Reflection of service of women in the Armed Forces in the Federal charter of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States

subsection.text: Section 230101(a) of title 36, United States Code, is amended by striking men and inserting veterans.
Section 230102(3) of such title is amended by striking widows and inserting surviving spouses.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
